title: Bullshit
body:
I dont care what anyone says, this is wrong.
how having 300 AD with mostly defensive items, deal more true damage than anything else, be almost impossible to kill, somehow have what seems like max attack speed, and kill me in 0.92 seconds is allowed is beyond me.

The human reaction time is 0.25 seconds, which means if i was going to have any chance to live, i needed land all my abilities and duel a true damage dealing tank within 0.67 seconds, now I don't need to explain to you that a simple auto attack takes longer to perform than 0.67 seconds, let alone the cast time for 4 abilities. So how exactly is this sporting?

How Riot? how?
(not rhetorical)

replies.body:
What champ were you playing?

What lvl were u when she killed you?

What items did you have at the time she killed you?

Why do you assume that the outplay happens during the duel? To outplay on someone like Quinn, you need to do it early into the laning phase or wait for team fights. The outplay happens 5 - 10 seconds before by not letting her engage, through good positioning and team play.

You wont outplay a bruiser in an **all in 1v1**, you need to hang back, poke, and get some peel from your team. 

You don't need to get off 4 abilities either. Flash or w for your escape, even if she uses riposte you still get the dash. The problem is I'd imagine you were out of position and got caught out, so even if you flashed and used W, it wouldn't have made a difference.

all of that is beside the point, and actually i wasn't out of position, but thats irrelevant anyway.

my point is that no champion with almost all defensive items should be able to 0.92 second another champ. (infact no champion should be able to 0.92 another champion ever)

Maybe you should get into playing more tanks then? 

Most ADC mains understand that small mistakes are very costly for them, because it takes only a few seconds for them to die. But when they are kept alive, they have the most DPS of any other role. 

Fair trade off.

Poppy gnar and vlad are my main top laners, and taric is my main support, (I'm not exactly squishy most of the time)

and yea small mistakes are costly, but 0.92 isn't 'only a few seconds' its not even 1 second. no single champion should be able to do that to another, even top assassins like Zed and Fizz etc etc have some counterplay because even though they can deal 3x your hp in damage you have windows were you can defend or escape. 0.92 seconds has no counterplay, and don't say "well team fighting is the counterplay"
because:

1. if a champions only counterplay is to gang up on them then they are broken from the start.

2. she destroyed in team fights, she just ulted the closest person, decimated them in 0.92 seconds and then spent the rest of the team fight dealing out true damage while being healed the entire time. (and we had some pretty fucking fed players, so it wasn't that we were behind.)

the only counterplay for that is to stay near the back in a teamfight and hope like hell she kills someone else first instead of you, so you can have a 0.92 second head start running away.

to put it in perspective if i was full health Azir (i wasnt Azir, but lets pretend), 0.25 seconds have passed since the damage started until my brain has thought 'wait something has happened, and pressed R, (R being one of the single best disengages in the entire game.) Literally by the time the cast animation for R has finished, i am dead.
so i ask you, where the fuck is the counter-play in that? Killing you so fast that even the best disengage in the game cant save you...

People say this, but when Fiora is 16 kills up, it's a bit too late for comebacks, especially this meta. You had your chances in the first 1 - 4 kills.

> if a champions only counterplay is to gang up on them then they are broken from the start.

+ She has more counter play than team fighting. Just that in your situation it was the best option. Going super sustain tank works well, also picking an even better 1v1 duellist should work.

 There's lots of champions like this though. If you want to kill a tanky bruiser, you're going to need more than 1 person. Most of these champions want to get into a 1v1 or 1v2, you're giving them exactly what they excel at. [Here](https://youtu.be/SLiTGQML3pI?t=3m18s)'s a Diamond YouTuber explaining how this works.
 
> she destroyed in team fights, she just ulted the closest person, decimated them in 0.92 seconds and then spent the rest of the team fight dealing out true damage while being healed the entire time. (and we had some pretty fucking fed players, so it wasn't that we were behind.)

+ Because you went to late game, and she was very fed. It's important to understand this. If you feed AP Riven to the point where she is level 18 and you are level 3. 

 Guess what? She's going to carry. Doesn't really matter what you do.


If you're struggling against these guys, play really easy super sustain tanks. Your top lane picks aren't the best counters for tanky bruisers actually (Poppy is alright), but your support main is perfect. Taric with Grasp of the Undying and Q heals is crazy in low elo right now.
It's riot what do you expect
Melee Carry/Assasin doing what they are designed to do?
Lok at her build... she's a tank not an assassin in this case..
i hate versing her, as soon as she builds {{item:3077}} i give up harrassing and focus farming, because its just pointless.

my reaction time is averaged at 119ms, so im good.

Also, if fiora used w in her kill combo no you, means she actually killed you in closer to .17-.25 sec
